response.overview: Tom is a young professional on a mission to rise up the corporate ladder and prove himself to the world. Full of potential, he jumps for a Marketing Director role at his workplace, OneMedia Broadband, but his insecurities leave him stumbling at the first hurdle - a pitch to the brash, 40-something CEO, Julie. Left with the challenge to up his game, Tom turns to his confidently colourful boyfriend, Daniel for support. With Daniel, we see Tomâ€™s playful character bloom, but an awkward encounter in the supermarket brings this warming affection to an abrupt halt.
response.title: My Friend Daniel
